item.title: Cathy add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "There is never a time or place for true love. It happens accidentally, in a heartbeat, in a single flashing, throbbing moment." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Cathy add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Cathy add a quote by Anaïs Nin
item.description: "Reality doesn't impress me. I only believe in intoxication, in ecstasy, and when ordinary life shackles me, I escape, one way or another. No more walls." -- Anaïs Nin

item.title: Cathy add a quote by Robert Louis Stevenson
item.description: "I travel not to go anywhere, but to go. I travel for travel's sake. The great affair is to move." -- Robert Louis Stevenson

item.title: Cathy add a quote by W.C. Fields
item.description: "I am free of all prejudice. I hate everyone equally. " -- W.C. Fields

item.title: Cathy add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Cathy add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "You love me. Real or not real?" I tell him, "Real." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Cathy add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Clothes make the man. Naked people have little or no influence on society." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Cathy add a quote by Elizabeth Barrett Browning
item.description: "How do I love thee? Let me count the ways." -- Elizabeth Barrett Browning

item.title: Cathy add a quote by Christopher Marlowe
item.description: "Make me immortal with a kiss." -- Christopher Marlowe

item.title: Cathy add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Eating and reading are two pleasures that combine admirably." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Cathy add a quote by Colleen Hoover
item.description:
"I got schooled this year <b>by a boy</b>.
A boy that I'm <b>seriously, deeply, madly, incredibly, and undeniably</b> in <i><b>love</b></i> with. And he taught me the most important thing of <b>all</b>...
To put the <b>emphasis</b> On <i><b>life</b></i>." -- Colleen Hoover

item.title: Cathy add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: Cathy add a quote by Cora Carmack
item.description: "Sex. I was going to have sex. With a boy. A hot boy. A hot BRITISH boy. Or maybe I was going to throw up. What if I threw up on the hot British boy? What if I threw up on the hot British boy DURING SEX?" -- Cora Carmack
